pci_project_flavors_category_definition_: Instances for general use offer a good balance of RAM and performance.
Metal instances offer physical servers on demand. They are delivered in a few minutes, and can be billed on an hourly or monthly basis.
Instances with optimised computing are ideally suited to applications that require high processing speeds or parallel task processing.
Instances with optimised memory are recommended for your databases, analyses and in-memory computing, as well as other RAM-intensive applications.
Instances with accelerated computing (GPU, FPGA) are up to 1,000 times faster than a CPU for certain applications (rendering, video transcoding, bioinformatics, big data, deep learning, etc.)
IOPS instances deliver the fastest disk transactions in the Public Cloud range.
No model available for this category
pci_project_flavors_disk_size: The disk space is lower than that of the current model
pci_project_flavors_quota_info: Your project quota will not allow you to add this machine type in this region.
pci_project_flavors_category_definition_: Instances with shared resources (Discovery) are adapted for tests, recipes and development environments. Their performance may vary slightly over time.
pci_project_flavors_zone_localzone_toolt: Local Zones are a new type of location, which support part of our Public Cloud product portfolio. We will gradually deploy more Local Zones around the world over the next few years.
pci_project_flavors_zone_globalregions_t: Regions are supported by one or more datacentres managed by OVHcloud. There are one or more Availability Zones in each Region, with a comprehensive portfolio of OVHcloud services.
